09:01 <DarkKnightCZ> mflorea: hi, is there a possibility that js part of wysiwyg editor stops propagating iframe load event? http://jsfiddle.net/djfkL/ works as expected, when modified for xwiki wysiwyg (http://pastebin.com/htUyis4D), it doesn't... both iframe vars contain iframe elements, only difference is that wysiwyg iframe is empty at the time of first event execution (but that shouldn't be the problem)

09:51 <spu7nic> Hi there, out of design perspective, would it be better to put all complicated data queries (HQL) into a java component - or is it best practice to put them into the view?

16:47 <andreeapopescu> has joined #xwiki  
16:49 <spu7nic> Hello, is it possible to debug a component with data access (DocumentAccessBridge) without running a full XWiki instance?  
16:58 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
17:04 <tmortagne> spu7nic:  you could use mockito or something like this to mock what DocumentAccessBridge needs but the quickest is probably to start a jetty/hsqldb instance in debug mode and do remote debug  
17:07 <UCC> has joined #xwiki  
17:07 <unknown\_> has joined #xwiki  
17:07 <spu7nic> tmortagne: Thanks :)  
17:08 <sdumitriu\_[Away]> has quit  
17:09 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
17:09 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> has joined #xwiki  
17:16 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
17:26 <spu7nic> tmortagne: Got the standalone version running in debug mode :) - do you know, if HotSwapping will get you in trouble?  
17:26 <tmortagne> spu7nic: you can do HotSwapping using remote debugging ?  
17:27 <tmortagne> (never tried that)  
17:28 <spu7nic> tmortagne:  I don't think so, but right now I am just trying to get the parameters in IntelliJ right, to get the debugging work inprocess  
17:29 <tmortagne> don't know much about IntelliJ (using Eclipse)  
17:30 <msmeria> has quit  
17:30 <spu7nic> but from Eclipse it works without any issues, as soon as you get the config right?  
17:32 <tmortagne> spu7nic: well I don't need to configure much in Eclipse, I start XWiki with debug mode script and then connect to it with the right port and that's it  
17:33 <tmortagne> (and of course I need to import the sources I want to debug)  
17:35 <tmortagne> it's pretty much http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/Debugging#HDebugaXWikireleasedversion  
17:40 <spu7nic> thanks a lot :)  
17:57 <KermitTheFragger> has quit
